name: Word Wars (Thomas Porta)
description:
Shoot words at your friends, family or even your enemies! 

The game is played by two players on the same keyboard. Each player is given 13 letters of the keyboard to write words with. Once you write a word you can launch it on your foe's tower. Deal as much damage as you can. The bigger the word, the bigger the damage. 

Each game is 3 minutes long and the letters are randomised each run. 

Have fun and remember, words are real weapons. Use them wisely. 

Game Design by Parham Sorooshian, Nick McKenzie and Thomas Porta

Music composed by Marcin Mazurek.
